original_text: For whoever wants to save their life will lose it, but whoever loses their life for me will find it.
korean_text: 누구든지 제 목숨을 구원하고자 하면 잃을 것이요 누구든지 나를 위하여 제 목숨을 잃으면 찾으리라

sentences.original_text: For whoever wants to save their life
but whoever loses their life for me
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 위해 자기 목숨을 잃는 사람은
